Symbol.Script_1D:
!Разбивка по словам !mlb_in_str = " stringxxstring " : mlb_l_max = 0.6 !dim mlb_out_str_arr[] !call "macro_line_break" parameters mlb_in_str=mlb_in_str, mlb_l_max=mlb_l_max, ! RETURNED_PARAMETERS mlb_n_row, mlb_out_str, mlb_out_str_arr
!DEFINE STYLE{2} "macro_line_break" AC_TextFont_1, AC_TextSize_1, AC_TextStyle_1 !STYLE "macro_line_break"
dim text_w[] : text_w[1] = "" dim text_r[] : text_r[1] = "" EPS = 0.0001 FILE_DEPENDENCE "macro_trim_space", "macro_replace_char", "macro_replace_word"
if strlen(mlb_in_str)<EPS then goto "m_end"
ns = 0 aft = mlb_in_str
mrc_newChar = " " : mrc_charToReplace = "\n" : mrc_in_str = aft call "macro_replace_char" parameters mrc_in_str=mrc_in_str, mrc_charToReplace=mrc_charToReplace, mrc_newChar = mrc_newChar, RETURNED_PARAMETERS mrc_out_str !if vardtype(mrc_out_str)=2 then aft = mrc_out_str if (STW(aft) / 1000 * GLOB_SCALE) <= mlb_l_max then rs = 1 text_r[rs] = aft goto "m_end" endif
!Чтоб на разрывать обозначение ГОСТа, ТУ или серий dim unbreak[] : i=0 i=i+1 : unbreak[i] = "ГОСТ" i=i+1 : unbreak[i] = "ТУ" i=i+1 : unbreak[i] = "Серия" i=i+1 : unbreak[i] = "Серии" i=i+1 : unbreak[i] = "ОСТ"
for inx = 1 to vardim1(unbreak) mrw_wordToReplace = unbreak[inx]+" " mrw_in_str = aft mrw_newWord = unbreak[inx]+"@" mrw_out_str = "" call "macro_replace_word" parameters mrw_in_str=mrw_in_str, mrw_newWord=mrw_newWord, mrw_wordToReplace = mrw_wordToReplace, RETURNED_PARAMETERS mrw_out_str if vartype(mrw_out_str)=2 then aft = mrw_out_str next inx
pos_prob = STRSTR(aft, " ", 1) WHILE pos_prob>0 DO word = STRSUB(aft, 1, pos_prob-1) if strlen(word)>0 then ns = ns + 1 text_w[ns] = word endif aft = STRSUB(aft, pos_prob+1, strlen(aft) - pos_prob) pos_prob = STRSTR(aft, " ", 1) ENDWHILE
ns = ns + 1 text_w[ns] = aft rs = 0 : ns = 1 for is = 1 to 100 txt = "" w_txt = 0 w_txt_next = 0 WHILE w_txt<=mlb_l_max and w_txt_next<=mlb_l_max and ns <= vardim1(text_w) DO if txt = "" then txt = text_w[ns] else txt = txt + " " + text_w[ns] endif w_txt = STW (txt) / 1000 * GLOB_SCALE if ns<vardim1(text_w) then w_txt_next = STW (txt + " " + text_w[ns+1]) / 1000 * GLOB_SCALE else w_txt_next = 0 endif ns = ns + 1 ENDWHILE if txt<>"" then rs = rs + 1 text_r[rs] = txt else goto "m_end" endif next is
"m_end":
mlb_out_str_ = "" for is=1 to rs txt = text_r[is] mts_in_str = txt call "macro_trim_space" parameters mts_in_str=mts_in_str, RETURNED_PARAMETERS mts_out_str if vartype(mts_out_str)=2 then txt = mts_out_str for inx = 1 to vardim1(unbreak) mrw_wordToReplace = unbreak[inx]+"@" mrw_in_str = txt mrw_newWord = unbreak[inx]+" " mrw_out_str = "" call "macro_replace_word" parameters mrw_in_str=mrw_in_str, mrw_newWord=mrw_newWord, mrw_wordToReplace = mrw_wordToReplace, RETURNED_PARAMETERS mrw_out_str if vartype(mrw_out_str)=2 then txt = mrw_out_str next inx if vartype(mrc_out_str)=2 then txt = mrc_out_str text_r[is] = txt mlb_out_str_ = mlb_out_str_ + text_r[is]+"\n" next is if mlb_out_str_ = "" then mlb_out_str_ = "ОШИБКА"
mlb_out_str_arr = text_r mlb_n_row = rs mlb_out_str = mlb_out_str_ parameters mlb_out_str_arr=mlb_out_str_arr, mlb_n_row=mlb_n_row, mlb_out_str=mlb_out_str EXIT mlb_n_row, mlb_out_str, mlb_out_str_arr
